August 1978: The Murder in Revenge

Plays:

The Murder in Revenge (国言詢音頭)

Scenes:

The Okawa River (大川)

The Mass Murder (五人伐)

Characters:

Kikuno (桜風呂の菊野)

Okishi (仲居お岸)

Kojoro, a maid (小女郎)

Iheita (若党伊平太)

Hatsuemon (八柴初右衛門)

Nisaburo (絵屋仁三郎)

Tea house proprietor (大重の亭主)

Gennosuke (弟源之助)

Servant (迎いの奴)

Omisu (許嫁おみす)

Busuke (悪者武助)
